```{r}
# sample MCAR dataset from PUMS
source("../../utils/sampleMCAR.R")
n = 10000
missing_col = c(1,3,7,9,10,11)
missing_prob = 0.45
set.seed(1)

output_list <- sampleMCAR(n, missing_prob)
df <- output_list[['df']]
df_observed <- output_list[['df_observed']]
```

```{r}
# save the file as .csv
write.table(df_observed,"./MCAR_45percent.csv", row.names = FALSE, sep = ',')
write.table(df,"./PUMS_MCAR_45percent.csv", row.names = FALSE, sep = ',')
```
